t: Products by Ontel - As Seen On TV
s: Ontel's first hit product was the Iron Wonder, an ironing kit that cut people's ironing time in half and prevented marks and burns on clothes. Following this success, Ontel continued to grow throughout the 90's and 2000's with the launch of popular items such as Ever Brite, the Miracle Bamboo Pillow, Furniture Feet, Swivel Sweeper Max, 5 Second Fix, and more. ...
